description: This file contains CSS rules for styling the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including theme management variables and styles for various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling class for the application, it centers the content, sets background color and text color, and applies animation.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the logo image with height adjustments and pointer events management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header component of the app, including background color, layout properties, and transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, borders, padding, and hover/active effects.
